item.title: Trump Urges Antigovernment Protesters in Iran to ‘Take Over’
item.description: “HELP IS ON ITS WAY,” President Trump said on social media. He has threatened to intervene militarily on behalf of the protesters if Iran uses lethal ...

item.title: As Iran’s Government Tries to Quell Protests, Accounts of Brutal Crackdown Emerge
item.description: As many as 3,000 feared dead as witnesses describe government forces firing on unarmed protesters.

item.title: Spanish Singer Julio Iglesias Accused of Sexual Assault
item.description: Prosecutors said two former employees of Mr. Iglesias, a renowned Spanish singer, had accused him of abuse. His representatives did not respond to req...

item.title: Uganda Cuts Internet Days Before Presidential Election
item.description: The authorities say the decision was made to prevent the spread of misinformation as President Yoweri Museveni seeks his seventh term in office.
